    About MBU Properties

    We operate through a digital platform combined with on-ground expertise to deliver transparent, efficient, and legally compliant property solutions.

    Who We Are

    MB&U Company Ltd is a full-service real estate and property management company based in Rwanda, providing professional services in property letting, sales brokerage, valuation, and regulatory compliance.

    Our Vision

    To become one of Rwanda's most trusted and technology-driven property management and real estate service providers.

    Our Mission

    To provide secure, transparent, and profitable property solutions for landlords, investors, and buyers through professional management, verified transactions, and regulatory compliance.

    Our Core Services

    End-to-end property solutions backed by technology and on-ground expertise.

    Property Letting & Rental Management

    • Tenant sourcing and screening
    • Lease agreement preparation
    • Rent collection and reporting
    • Routine inspections
    • Maintenance coordination
    • Rent arrears management
    8%–12% monthly rental commission

    Property Sales (Brokerage)

    • Property marketing (online + offline)
    • Buyer sourcing
    • Negotiation and transaction management
    • Offer documentation
    • Closing coordination
    3%–5% sales commission

    Property Valuation Services

    • Market value assessment
    • Investment advisory valuations
    • Pre-sale valuation
    • Bank and financing valuation support
    Fixed valuation fee or project-based pricing

    Compliance & Documentation

    • Title verification support
    • Land registration guidance
    • Lease drafting assistance
    • Property tax compliance guidance
    • Regulatory advisory
    Service-based fixed fees

    Why Choose MBU Properties

    We combine physical property oversight with a structured digital platform for maximum accountability.

    Our Value Proposition

    Verified property listings
    Transparent commission structure
    Legal and compliance-focused transactions
    Professional tenant screening
    Digital tracking and reporting
    Technology-driven property management

    Who We Serve

    Individual landlords
    Diaspora property owners
    Real estate investors
    Property developers
    Corporate tenants
    Foreign investors entering Rwanda
    Land buyers and sellers

    Competitive Advantage

    Tech-driven operationsFinancial transparencyLegal integrationDiaspora focusStructured commissions

    Growth Roadmap

    Our structured path to becoming Rwanda's leading property management platform.

    Phase 1

    Kigali Rental Management

    Establish core property management operations in Kigali with tenant sourcing, lease management, and rent collection.

    Phase 2

    Property Sales & Valuations

    Expand into property sales brokerage and professional valuation services for investors and financial institutions.

    Phase 3

    Mobile Platform

    Develop a full-featured mobile application for property owners, tenants, and investors to manage portfolios on the go.

    Phase 4

    National Expansion

    Scale operations to major Rwandan cities including Musanze, Rubavu, and Huye.

    Phase 5

    Investment Advisory

    Offer property investment advisory services and portfolio management for local and international investors.

    Our Values

    The principles that guide everything we do at MBU Properties.

    Transparency
